com.paypal.selion.reports.runtime

Interface DataSaver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SaverFileSystem

    public interface DataSaver
    Simple interface for data persistence of web page parts.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PageContents getScreenshotByName(String name)
      Get a PageContents by name
      void init()
      Initialize the saver.
      String saveScreenshot(PageContents s)
      Save a screenshot to the data store.
      String saveSources(PageContents s)

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init()
        Initialize the saver.

      • saveScreenshot

        String saveScreenshot(PageContents s)
                      throws Exception
        Save a screenshot to the data store.
        Parameters:
        s - a PageContents object
        Returns:
        a String which represents a means for retrieving the screen shot, such as a file path or url.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • saveSources

        String saveSources(PageContents s)
        Save sources to the data store
        Parameters:
        s - the PageContents object
        Returns:
        a String which represent a means for retrieved the source code, such as a file path or url.

      • getScreenshotByName

        PageContents getScreenshotByName(String name)
                                 throws Exception
        Get a PageContents by name
        Parameters:
        name - the String for retrieving the PageContents from the data store.
        Returns:
        the retrieved PageContents
        Throws:
        Exception
